review: So my cable company wanted over $100 to install cable in my back bedroom which was way too high for me because I am currently in a rental home and didn't want to spend that much just to have TV in the bedroom. I was considering buying a smart TV to put in the room so I could watch Netflix or HULU when my husband suggested this. This thing has been awesome! Now if I feel like watching a movie in bed at night or on the weekends I can do just that! I really like the flexibility of being able to use different apps via your phone because we had a roku prior but it was so limited and so it never got used.
